channel.title: Remix Ep challenge - Basement Chemists
channel.description:
So I put out an EP playlist awhile ago; ten tracks totaling a little under half an hour. I was thinking it would be cool to have a remix version of the EP with various artists doing the remixes.
Here is the playlist with the tracks: https://soundcloud.com/dylan-quinn-smith/sets/emojicons
If you would like to participate let me know in this thread and I'll direct message you the project file of the song you would like to remix. Hope I get a few takers on this.

Oh and thank you I’m glad you liked them
